fields.name: Blood Letting (0x, 65%):
fields.value: Inflict bleeding on any target who placed below you last evening. They can heal the bleeding by placing above you (or being targeted by an ability that heals any type of bleeding). Otherwise, they will die during night phase after two evenings have passed.

fields.name: Emetic (0x, 100%):
fields.value: Attack someone with your attack power, multiplied by the amount of characters in their response converted to a percentage, rather than your evening score. (70 characters = 70% x 1.0 = 70%)

fields.name: Melancholia (1x, 70%):
fields.value: Attack a player with your attack power. If they live, their defense decreases by 0.1x for the following night.

fields.name: Eukrasia (Passive):
fields.value: If you pass a night phase without using an ability or getting attacked, you can use two abilities the following night phase.
